communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Kansas Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records, documents, communications, proposals, purchase orders, meeting minutes, or internal discussions related to:

- The purchase, planned purchase, or distribution of Bibles or other religious texts for use in Kansas public schools.
- The purchase, planned purchase, or distribution of posters, plaques, or other displays of the Ten Commandments for placement in Kansas public schools.
- Any meetings, discussions, proposals, lobbying efforts, or internal communications regarding efforts to introduce these items into public school settings.

Please provide:

-Emails, letters, and memos between school officials, staff, vendors, or outside groups (including any religious or advocacy organizations) related to these topics.
-Meeting minutes, transcripts, notes, or agendas from relevant committees, boards, or working groups where these topics were discussed.
-Proposals, policy drafts, or lobbying materials indicating any efforts to promote or oppose the inclusion of Bibles or Ten Commandments displays in schools.
-Communications with vendors or third parties regarding the supply of such materials.
-Budget proposals, funding requests, or grants (whether approved or pending) for these purchases.

I request records from January 1, 2022 to Present. Please search both physical and electronic records, and include any relevant emails or attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rachel Janes

title: Untitled (Office of the Governor of Kansas)
